posts.post_content:
I was looking to acquire a low grade William Otey portrait, raw/graded, OM/Piedmont back, whichever.

Please let me know if you have one available.  I have several SLers to trade if that should be of greater interest to you.

Thank you.  :)

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
